page.title: 03Local Churches
page.content:
There are 3 Churches in the area of Wybunbury and Hough.
The Anglican Church is situated in Wybunbury and is a modern building which can also be used as a Church Hall.This Church replaced the traditional style Church, which had to be demolished due to subsidence.Only the tower of this Church remains standing.The incumbent of the Parish is also Priest in charge of Doddington.
The other Churches are of Methodist denomination,one in Wybunbury and one in Hough.These are under the supervision of the Minister of Audlem.
Wybunbury School is Church Aided and thus has close contacts with the Anglican Church.
